quotes.text: Be yourself; everyone else is already taken.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.text: Two things are infinite: the universe and human stupidity; and I'm not sure about the universe.
quotes.author: Albert Einstein

quotes.text: Be the change that you wish to see in the world.
quotes.author: Mahatma Gandhi

quotes.text: In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on.
quotes.author: Robert Frost

quotes.text: If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything.
quotes.author: Mark Twain
Albert Einstein
quotes.text: I have tried 99 times and have failed, but on the 100th time came success.

quotes.author: Albert Einstien
quotes.text: Anyone who has never made a mistake has never tried anything new.

quotes.author: Alexander Graham Bell
quotes.text: The achievement of one goal should be the starting point of another.

quotes.author: Anatole France
quotes.text: To accomplish great things, we must not only act, but also dream, not only plan, but also believe.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: What you declare, you will achieve.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Don't you get it? This very second you could be doing something you love and dream about doing. So do it! NOW!

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Good things come to those who hustle while they wait.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Time, patience, and perseverance will accomplish all things.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: To be a winner, all you have to give is all you have.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Success is more attitude than aptitude.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Excellence is not being the best; it is doing your best.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: When everything feels like an uphill struggle, just think of the view from the top.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Approach the start of each day with something in mind and end the day with one word.. .DONE.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Life is only what we choose to make it.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Happiness is the highest level of success.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: In every problem there is a hidden treasure inside. It's your job to find it.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Life is short. Focus from this day forward on making a difference.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Ideas are a dime a dozen, they are worthless, but people who put their ideas into action are priceless.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Your dreams minus your doubts equal your true worth.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: The man who said he never had a chance, never took one.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Dream your wildest dreams and you will live a wild life.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Success comes to those who dare to begin.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Your success is only limited by your desire.

quotes.author: Anonymous
quotes.text: Winning doesn't make you a better person, but being a better person will make you a winner.

quotes.author: Anthony Pagano
quotes.text: To be a leader, you must stand for something, or you will fall for anything.

quotes.author: Anthony Robbins
quotes.text: Each day we must strive for constant and never ending improvement.

quotes.author: Anthony Robbins
quotes.text: If you think you can or if you think you can't, either way you are right.

quotes.author: Anthony Robbins
quotes.text: The path to success is to take massive determined action.

quotes.author: Anthony Robbins
quotes.text: I do believe I am special. My special gift is my vision, my commitment, and my willingness to do whatever it takes.

quotes.author: Anton Chekov
quotes.text: Man is what he believes.

quotes.author: Archilochus
quotes.text: We do not rise to the level of our expectations. We fall to the level of our training.”

quotes.author: Arnold Schwarzenegger
quotes.text: You know that wherever you are in life, there will be moments when you need outside motivation and insight. There will be times when you don’t have the answer, or the drive, and you’re forced to look beyond yourself.

quotes.author: Beverly Sills
quotes.text: You may be disappointed if you fail, but you are doomed if you do not try.

quotes.author: Brian Tracy
quotes.text: Success is predictable.

quotes.author: Brian Tracy
quotes.text: Successful people tend to become more successful because they are always thinking about their successes.

quotes.author: Brian Tracy
quotes.text: Our mind is the most valuable possession that we have. The quality of our lives is, and will be, a reflection of how well we develop, train, and utilize this precious gift.

quotes.author: Charles R. Swindoll
quotes.text: The past is over.. .forget it. The future holds hope… reach for it.

quotes.author: Clair Oliver
quotes.text: Society may predict, but only I can determine my destiny.

quotes.author: Claudia Black
quotes.text: Trust in yourself. Your perceptions are often far more accurate than you are willing to believe.

quotes.author: D. Elder
quotes.text: Dreamers look into the future and see promise. Those who do not dream only see the future.

quotes.author: Diana von Welanetz Wentworth
quotes.text: It doesn't matter what you are thinking, or what fear you have, if you just do it! Action is the only thing that matters.. .I can see that at the end of my life, I am not going to look back and say, "I wish I had taken more action".

quotes.author: Dr. Samuel Johnson
quotes.text: Great works are performed not by strength, but perseverance.

quotes.author: Earl Nightingale
quotes.text: People with goals succeed because they know where they are going.

quotes.author: Edmund Spencer
quotes.text: It is the mind that makes good or ill. That which makes us happy or sad; rich or poor.

quotes.author: Francis Bacon
quotes.text: If we are to achieve results never before accomplished, we must expect to employ methods never before attempted.

quotes.author: Frank Lloyd Wright
quotes.text: I know the price of success: dedication, hard work, and an unremitting devotion to the things you want to see happen.

quotes.author: Harvey Mackay
quotes.text: People become successful the minute they decide to.

quotes.author: Helen Keller
quotes.text: We can do anything we want to if we stick to it long enough.

quotes.author: Helice Bridges
quotes.text: I am not just here to make a living; I am here to make a life.

quotes.author: Herbert Kaufman
quotes.text: The habit of persistence is the habit of victory.

quotes.author: Herodotus
quotes.text: Some men give up their designs when they have almost reached their goal, while others obtain a victory by exerting, at the last moment, more vigorous efforts than ever before.

quotes.author: J. Krishnamurti
quotes.text: “It is no measure of health to be well adjusted to a profoundly sick society.”

quotes.author: Jack Canfield
quotes.text: When you think you can't … revisit a previous triumph.

quotes.author: Jack Canfield
quotes.text: To change bad habits, we must study the habits of successful role models.

quotes.author: James Allen
quotes.text: Having conceived of his purpose, a man should mentally mark out a straight pathway to its achievement, looking neither to the right or to the left, but straight.

quotes.author: James Allen
quotes.text: People are anxious to improve their circumstances, but are unwilling to improve themselves.That is why they remain bound.

quotes.author: James Champy
quotes.text: Without ambition no conquests are made, and no business created. Ambition is the root of all achievement.

quotes.author: James F. Bell
quotes.text: Fear is met and destroyed with courage. Again and again when the struggle seems hopeless and all opportunity lost, the one with a little more courage, and a little more effort will have victory.

quotes.author: Jim Rohn
quotes.text: Success is neither magical nor mysterious. Success is the natural consequence of consistently applying the basic fundamentals.

quotes.author: Jodie Foster
quotes.text: In the end, winning is sleeping better.

quotes.author: Joe Carlozo
quotes.text: Never stop learning. If you learn one new thing everyday, you will overcome 99% of your competition.

quotes.author: John S. Hinds
quotes.text: Success is the prize for those who stand true to their ideas.

quotes.author: Kurt Vonnegut
quotes.text: Out on the edge you see all kinds of things you can’t see from the center. Big, undreamed-of things—the people on the edge see them first.

quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.text: When I let go of what I am, I become what I might be.

quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.text: If you are depressed, you are living in the past. If you are anxious, you are living in the future. If you are at peace, you are living in the present.

quotes.author: Lao Tzu
quotes.text: “Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage . . .”

quotes.author: Lin Yutang
quotes.text: The wisdom of life consists in the elimination of non-essentials.

quotes.author: Mark Twain
quotes.text: I am an old man and I have known a great many troubles, but most of them never happened

quotes.author: Mark Victor Hansen
quotes.text: Money never starts an idea; it's the idea that starts the money.

quotes.author: Michael Jordan
quotes.text: I have failed over and over again. That is why I succeed.

quotes.author: Mike Litman
quotes.text: The fastest way to pass your own expectations is to add passion to your labor.

quotes.author: Napoleon Bonaparte
quotes.text: Imagination rules the world.

quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.text: Victory is always possible for the person who refuses to stop fighting.

quotes.author: Napoleon Hill
quotes.text: The starting point of all achievement is desire. Keep this constantly in mind. Weak desire brings weak results, just as a small amount of fire makes a small amount of heat.

quotes.author: Neale Donald Walsch
quotes.text: The struggle ends when the gratitude begins.

quotes.author: Pablo Picasso
quotes.text: Learn the rules like a pro, so you can break them like an artist.”

quotes.author: Paul Kearly
quotes.text: Your ideas are like diamonds.. .without the refining process, they are just a dirty rock, but by cutting away the impurities, they become priceless.

quotes.author: Peter Davies
quotes.text: Motivation is like food for the brain. You cannot get enough in one sitting. It needs continual and regular refills.

quotes.author: Pierre-Marc-Gaston
quotes.text: Judge a man by his questions rather than his answers.

quotes.author: Ray Norda
quotes.text: Cause change and lead; accept change and survive; resist change and die.

quotes.author: Rumi
quotes.text: “What you seek is seeking you.”

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.text: He who suffers before it is necessary suffers more than is necessary

quotes.author: Seneca
quotes.text: Set aside a certain number of days, during which you shall be content with the scantiest and cheapest fare, with coarse and rough dress, saying to yourself the while: ‘Is this the condition that I feared?

quotes.author: Sugar Ray Robinson
quotes.text: To be a champion, you have to believe in yourself when nobody else will.

quotes.author: T.S. Eliot
quotes.text: Sometimes things become possible if we want them bad enough.

quotes.author: T.S. Eliot
quotes.text: Only those who risk going too far can possibly find out how far one can go.

quotes.author: Thich Nhat Hanh
quotes.text: There is no way to happiness—happiness is the way

quotes.author: Thomas Edison
quotes.text: There is always a better way.

quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord
quotes.text: If you have a burning desire and a plan to take action, there is absolutely nothing you cannot achieve.

quotes.author: Thomas J. Vilord
quotes.text: God created all men equal. Why do some accomplish far greater accomplishments then others? Because they had a vision, a desire, and they took action.

quotes.author: Todd Bellemare
quotes.text: Courage is facing your fears. Stupidity is fearing nothing.

quotes.author: Tom Hopkins
quotes.text: Read some thing positive every night listen to something helpful every morning.

quotes.author: Tracy L. McNair
quotes.text: Accept the past for what it was. Acknowledge the present for what it is. Anticipate the future for what it can become.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.text: The spirit, the will to win, and the will to excel are the things that endure. These qualities are so much more important than the events that occur.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.text: Winning is not a "sometime" thing. You don't win once in a awhile, you don't do things right once in awhile, you do them right all of the time. Winning is a habit, unfortunately, so is losing.

quotes.author: Vince Lombardi
quotes.text: It's not whether you get knocked down; it's whether you get back up.

quotes.author: W.H. Auden
quotes.text: Routine, in an intelligent man, is a sign of ambition.

quotes.author: Winston Churchill
quotes.text: He who dares, wins.

quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson
quotes.text: Genius is divine perseverance. Genius I cannot have, but perseverance all can have.

quotes.author: Woodrow Wilson
quotes.text: I would rather fail in a cause that would ultimately succeed, than succeed in a cause that would ultimately fail.

quotes.author: Woody Allen
quotes.text: 80% of success is showing up.

quotes.author: Zig Ziglar
quotes.text: Concentrated thoughts produce desired results.
